    Normalization By Trimmed Mean of M-values (TMM)

    norm.TMM.Rd

    Normalize the dataset using TMM, and return the normalized dataset with scaling factor scaled by 1e6.

    norm.TMM(raw, groups)

    Arguments

    raw

    raw count data in the format of data frame or matrix, with columns for samples and rows for genes.
    groups

    vector of characters indicating the group for each sample.

    Value

    list, containing dat.normed (normalized dataset) and scaling.factor (scaling factor) for each sample.

    References

    edgeR User Guide

    Examples

    test.TMM <-  norm.TMM(data.test, data.group)
